definition: earthquake intensity (measure of its destructive power)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: There are more than four thousand Seismic Intensity Meters in place throughout Japan to measure earthquake activity.
sentences.chinese: 有超過四千日本全國地震烈度表中來衡量地震活動。

sentences.english: Seismic intensity is a term frequently used.
sentences.chinese: 地震烈度是經常使用的一個名詞。

sentences.english: There are more than four thousand seismic intensity meters in place across the country to measure earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 有超過四千在全國各地方來衡量地震烈度米。

definition: powerful earthquake/abbr. for 強烈地震|强烈地震
shallow earthquake (with epicenter less than 70 km deep)
deep earthquake (with epicenter more than 300 km deep)
